name: Longo's Adventures in ZERO-G
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK jam 2018: A platformer without gravity!

Longo, a maintainence robot, is tasked with repairing a space station's gravity generator. Since the game is called "Longo's Adventures in Zero G", i'm sure you can imagine how well that goes. Now longo must flee from the station, lest he be incinerated for his incompetence!

Sounds and music provided by LittleRobotSoundFactory
